meanings.sent1: The queen wore a jeweled crown to the royal ball.
meanings.sent2: The actress sparkled in her jeweled necklace on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked proudly with a tiny jeweled collar around its neck.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was like a jeweled blanket, scattered with stars.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with jeweled rings and bracelets.

meanings.definition: Decorated or embellished with jewels or gemstones.
meanings.sent1: The jeweled vase glistened on the mantelpiece.
meanings.sent2: The bride's dress was adorned with beautiful jeweled embroidery.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so fancy, it even had jeweled icing on top!
meanings.sent4: The garden was a jeweled paradise with flowers of every color.
meanings.sent5: The ancient sword was a masterpiece with jeweled hilt and scabbard.
